items.text: To the chief Musician on Neginoth upon Sheminith, A Psalm of David.
items.plainText: To the chief Musician on Neginoth upon Sheminith, A Psalm of David.

items.text: O LORD, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
items.plainText: O LORD, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.

items.text: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
items.plainText: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed.

items.text: My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O LORD, how long?
items.plainText: My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O LORD, how long?

items.text: Return, O LORD, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies' sake.
items.plainText: Return, O LORD, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies' sake.

items.text: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?
items.plainText: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?

items.text: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
items.plainText: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.

items.text: Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.
items.plainText: Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.

items.text: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the LORD hath heard the voice of my weeping.
items.plainText: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the LORD hath heard the voice of my weeping.

items.text: The LORD hath heard my supplication; the LORD will receive my prayer.
items.plainText: The LORD hath heard my supplication; the LORD will receive my prayer.

items.text: Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and be ashamed suddenly.
items.plainText: Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and be ashamed suddenly.
